participant_2.background:
My parents are science deniers , but un religious.
I don t believe any a.
I am wiccan , but haven t told them.
Story i ve ever heard.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing?
I'm doing well, thank you! How about you?
I'm doing well, thank you! I'm just working at the community garden center right now, and I'm volunteering at the animal shelter later.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm a veteran, and I'm currently going to school to get my bachelor's degree. I also love my girlfriend very much.
That's great! I'm glad you have a good job and are going to school. I'm also happy to hear that you love your girlfriend.
Thank you! I'm glad to hear that you're happy with your life as well.
I am! I'm just a little bit worried about my parents. They're science deniers, and I'm afraid they're not going to be okay with the fact that I'm a wiccan.
I'm sorry to hear that. I'm sure they'll come around eventually. I'm a veteran, and my parents were not very supportive of it at first, but they eventually came around.
I hope you're right. I'm just not sure how I'm going to tell them.
I know it's hard, but I think you should just be honest with them. Tell them that you're a wiccan, and that you're happy with it.
I think you're right. I just need to work up the courage to do it.
I'm here for you if you need me.
